properties.title: Portolá Expedition Arrives at Santa Barbara Channel
properties.description: First Spanish over‑land expedition passes Chumash villages, marking colonial incursion.

properties.title: Summerland Oil Field Pioneers On‑shore & Off‑shore Wells
properties.description: Summerland becomes one of the world’s first off‑shore drilling sites, foreshadowing later environmental hazards.

properties.title: 1969 Santa Barbara Channel Blowout
properties.description: Union Oil Platform A blowout spills >3 million gallons of crude, galvanizing the modern environmental movement.
